API_Description: The default value of a field—that is, the value that the field is set to when the form is reset. For combo boxes and list boxes, either an export or a user value can be used to set the default. A conflict can occur, for example, when the field has an export value and a user value with the same value but these apply to different items in the list. In such cases, the export value is matched against first. **Fields** all except `button` , `signature`
